headline: Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings to Hold Conference Call on First Quarter 2025 Financial Results
summary: MIAMI, April 10, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Ltd. (NYSE: NCLH) (together with NCL Corporation Ltd., “Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings” or the “Company”) announced today it will report first quarter 2025 financial results on Wednesday, April 30, 2025 at 6:30 a.m. Eastern Time with a conference call and webcast to discuss results at 8:00 a.m. Eastern Time. The conference call will be webcast via the Company’s Investor Relations website, https://www.nclhltd.com/investors.

headline: MS upgrades Carnival, prefers Royal Caribbean amid recession risks, demand drop
summary: Investing.com -- Morgan Stanley flagged the weakest U.S. cruise demand in three years following fresh channel checks, prompting earnings and price target cuts across the sector. The brokerage Carnival (NYSE:CCL) Corp upgrade to "Equal-weight," but the analysts maintained a cautious tone about the sector while expressing a preference for Royal Caribbean (NYSE:RCL) amid rising macroeconomic uncertainty.

headline: Norwegian Cruise Line (NCLH) Surges 18.3%: Is This an Indication of Further Gains?
summary: Norwegian Cruise Line (NCLH) witnessed a jump in share price last session on above-average trading volume. The latest trend in earnings estimate revisions for the stock doesn't suggest further strength down the road.
